Class AdminDao

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class AdminDao
extends java.lang.Object
    Data access layer for admin objects.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static long create(java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          boolean active)
                   throws DaoException
        Creates a new admin using the data provided.
        Parameters:
        username - the admin's username.
        password - the admin's password.
        active - the admin's active status.
        Returns:
        the newly created admin's id.
        Throws:
        DaoException - if the newly created admin's id could not be retrieved or a data access error occurs.

      • findById

        public static AdminDao findById(long adminId)
                         throws DaoException
        Retrieves an existing admin with specified id.
        Parameters:
        adminId - the admin's id.
        Returns:
        an object representing the admin found, or null if an admin with specified id was not found.
        Throws:
        DaoException - if a data access error occurs.

      • findByUsername

        public static AdminDao findByUsername(java.lang.String username)
                               throws DaoException
        Retrieves an existing admin with specified username.
        Parameters:
        username - the admin's username.
        Returns:
        an object representing the admin found, or null if an admin with specified username was not found.
        Throws:
        DaoException - if a data access error occurs.

      • setActive

        public static void setActive(long adminId,
                             boolean active)
                      throws DaoException
        Sets the active status of an admin to a specific value.
        Parameters:
        adminId - the admin's id.
        active - the admin's active status.
        Throws:
        DaoException - if the admin's active status could not be changed to the specified value or a data access error occurs.
